rows.Name: unknown
rows.Info: Chance for an item on this list to not be spawned at all (for example, 75 means there's a 25% to spawn an item).

rows.Name: unknown
rows.Info:
Flags:
0x01=All levels (sets it to calculate for all entries < player level, choosing randomly from all the entries under)
0x02=Each (sets it to repeat a check every time the list is called (if it's called multiple times), otherwise it will use the same result for all counts.)
0x04=Use all (use all entries when the list is called)
0x08=Special loot

rows.Name: Global
rows.Info: Points to a global record. If this is set, the value of the global is used instead of LVLD for chance none.

rows.Name: unknown
rows.Info: The number of entries in the list (the number of LVLO entries, essentially).

rows.Name: level
rows.Info: The level set for the entry. Reference level appears to be set by player level only? Affected by level scaling multipliers?

rows.SubRecord: The item or LVLI used by the entry.
How many items are added or used when this list is called.
